column1: 16,190,346,594,346,594,447,190,447,Discontinue coal retention analyses on licensee submitted product samples (Note : Coal Retention testing is not performed by most licensees. Other B&W physical measurements as ends stability and inspection for soft spots in ciparettes are thought to be sufficient measures to assure cigarette physical integrity. The proposed action will increase laboratory productivity . ),answer

18,263,483,593,483,593,553,263,553,Delete coal retention from the list of standard analyses performed on licensee submitted product samples. Special requests for coal retention testing could still be submitted on an exception basis.,answer
